summary: Fixed 13 LaTeX formatting issues in 03-DynamicsFoundation.tex: converted to BNF notation, added type theory predicates, restructured primitives vs derived operators with new stability operator, added evolution definitions and Containment theorem, updated world-history as maximal possible evolution. Document compiles cleanly at 11 pages.
